thread.title: Adblock Plus now arrives on iOS, Android as browser app - Life and style
thread.title_full: Adblock Plus now arrives on iOS, Android as browser app - Life and style

author: Agencies
title: Adblock Plus now arrives on iOS, Android as browser app - Life and style
text:
Amsterdam: Eyeo, the creator of Adblock Plus, has released Adblock Plus browser for both iOS and Android for free.
According to The Next Web, it is based on top of an extensible iOS browser called Kitt which made it easy to port the Chrome extension from desktop.

Pic/YouTube 
Adblock Plus blocks advertising as it is loaded by the browser using JavaScript.
The Adblock Browser, which was launched as a beta on Android back in May, saw 300,000 downloads in the first week.
The users can download Adblock Plus, but they will need to switch their browser to use it.
